[Click to run](https://dataexplorer.azure.com/clusters/help/databases/Samples?)

```kql
datatable (TextWall: string)
[
	"[Intro] Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh",
	"oh Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh",
	"oh Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh",
	"oh Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh, oh",
	"",
	"[Verse 1] I used to rule the world",
	"Chunks would load when I gave the word",
	"Now every night I go stow away",
	"Hide from the mobs I used to slay",
	"",
	"[Instrumental Interlude]",
	"",
	"[Verse 2]",
	"They once were terrified",
	"Every time I looked into their eyes",
	"Villagers would cheer my way",
	"For a hero I was, that's what they'd say",
	"One minute we had it all",
	"Next, our world began to fall",
	"Away from all that it had once become",
	"They all cried for my help, but I stood there numb",
	"",
	"[Chorus]",
	"I gaze off into the boundless skyline",
	"Note block choirs playing in the sunshine",
	"Turn around, pick up my sword and wield",
	"The blade that once forced evil mobs to yield",
	"And hope one day that this chaos and",
	"Destruction turns for the better",
	"Never a bow in hand",
	"That was when I ruled the land",
	"[Instrumental Interlude]",
	"",
	"[Verse 3]",
	"It was the creepers and the skeletons",
	"Blew down the doors and boxed us in",
	"Arrows whizzing by like streaks of light",
	"I tried all that I could to stay and fight",
	"As the undead roamed the street",
	"Families broken at my feet",
	"Life itself suspended by a thread",
	"Oh, why was it that I wasn't dead?",
	"",
	"[Chorus]",
	"I gaze off into the boundless skyline",
	"Note block choirs playing in the sunshine",
	"Turn around, pick up my sword and wield",
	"The blade that once forced evil mobs to yield",
	"If this battle should leave me slain",
	"I know Herobrine will call my name",
	"Better to take a stand",
	"That was when I ruled the land",
	"",
	"[Bridge]",
	"Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh, oh",
	"Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh, oh",
	"Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh, oh",
	"Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh, oh",
	"[Chorus]",
	"I gazed off into the boundless skyline",
	"Note block choirs playing in the sunshine",
	"Turn around, pick up my sword and wield",
	"The blade that once forced evil mobs to yield",
	"If this battle should leave me slain",
	"I know Herobrine will call my name",
	"Better to take a stand",
	"And that was when I ruled the land",
	"",
	"[Outro]",
	"Ooo-ooo-ooo-ooo",
	"Ooo-ooo-ooo-ooo",
	"Ooo-ooo-ooo-ooo"
]
| union *
| project TextWall
| summarize make_list_if(tostring(TextWall),not(isempty(TextWall)))
| project-rename TextWall = list_TextWall
| where TextWall contains "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "" "a"
| where (((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((TextWall contains "b")))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
| where TextWall contains "c" and TextWall contains "c"
| project-reorder TextWall
| extend _0 = " "
| extend _1 = "J"
| extend _2 = extract("u",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _2) | project-away _2
| extend _3 = extract("s",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _3) | project-away _3
| extend _4 = extract("t",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _4) | project-away _4
| extend _1 = strcat(_1, _0)
| extend _5 = extract("a",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _5) | project-away _5
| extend _6 = extract("n",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _6) | project-away _6
| extend _7 = extract("o",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _7) | project-away _7
| extend _8 = extract("t",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _8) | project-away _8
| extend _9 = extract("h",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _9) | project-away _9
| extend _10 = extract("e",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _10) | project-away _10
| extend _11 = extract("r",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _11) | project-away _11
| extend _1 = strcat(_1, _0)
| extend _12 = toupper(extract("k",0,tostring(TextWall))) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _12) | project-away _12
| extend _13 = extract("u",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _13) | project-away _13
| extend _14 = extract("s",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _14) | project-away _14
| extend _15 = extract("t",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _15) | project-away _15
| extend _16 = extract("o",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _16) | project-away _16
| extend _1 = strcat(_1, _0)
| extend _17 = extract("h",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _17) | project-away _17
| extend _18 = extract("a",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _18) | project-away _18
| extend _19 = extract("c",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _19) | project-away _19
| extend _20 = extract("k",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _20) | project-away _20
| extend _21 = extract("e",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _21) | project-away _21
| extend _22 = extract("r",0,tostring(TextWall)) | extend _1 = strcat(_1, _22) | project-away _22
| project-away _0 | project-away TextWall
| project-rename Thou_Wish_Is_My_Command = _1
```
